title: Crowley and Aziraphale From Good Omens | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video
comment: Watch Good Omens now exclusively with your Prime Membership: http://bit.ly/GoodOmensPrimeVideo

Amazon: Aren’t Aziraphale and Crowley such good friends 😊

The comment section: Am I a joke to you?
I hope that BFF in the title stands for "boyfriends forever"
How cute when your bff is your boyfriend, right Amazon?
Do you mean: Crowley and Aziraphale being an old married couple for five and a half minutes ineffable
description:
They say absence makes the heart grow fonder, but Good Omens' Crowley and Aziraphale wouldn't know anything about that. They've been shuffling through eternity side by side for 6,000 years and it definitely shows. 6,000 years down, infinity to go. Watch Good Omens now, only on Prime Video.
